episodes.title: Oklahoma City Bombing
episodes.description: As a direct result of the Waco Massacre, the Alfred P. Murrah Federal Building was bombed. In this chapter of the Cult Chronicles, we learn about the Oklahoma City Bombing. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Timothy_McVeigh https://www.fbi.gov/history/famous-cases/oklahoma-city-bombing https://www.latimes.com/archives/la-xpm-1995-04-27-mn-59616-story.html https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Patriot_movement https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZIYohleLlWw https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Turner_Diaries https://www.fbi.gov/history/famous-cases/world-trade-center-bombing-1993 https://www.latimes.com/archives/la-xpm-1995-04-26-mn-59097-story.html https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Terry_Nichols

episodes.title: Interview w Kevin Jones
episodes.description: This week, I had the privilege to interview a surviving Branch Davidian, Kevin Jones. He shares his insight on what it was like to live at Mt. Carmel Center. He also goes over the siege.

episodes.title: Waco Massacre
episodes.description: The Waco Massacre was a horrific scene. After a 51-day standoff 76 were left dead. This chapter of cult chronicles covers everything you need to know. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4GJhsnxcsrY https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AIDBvD3kGKg Let’s Talk About Sects Podcast – Branch Davidians American Scandal – Season 15 https://swan-cymbals-ytgn.squarespace.com https://en.wikipedia.org//wiki/Waco_siege Waco: American Apocalypse https://www.docusign.com/blog/what-is-an-affidavit https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/CRPT-106hrpt1037/html/CRPT-106hrpt1037.htm http://www.jaedworks.com/shoebox/waco.html Waco – a dramatized reenactment Waco: Rules of Engagement https://www.justice.gov/archives/publications/waco/report-deputy-attorney-general-events-waco-texas-introduction https://vault.fbi.gov/waco-branch-davidian-compound?b_start:int=0 https://www.wacosurvivors.com/david-koresh-music-sermons https://www.pbs.org/wgbh/pages/frontline/waco/timeline.html https://www.merriam-webster.com/dictionary/psyops https://www.aclu.org/news/free-speech/military-may-be-engaged-illegal-psychological

episodes.title: Ruby Ridge
episodes.description: It’s amazing what the government will do to people they consider extremists. To understand Waco, you have to know Ruby Ridge. That’s what we are learning about in this chapter of Cult Chronicles. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ruby_Ridge https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Randy_Weaver https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Late_Great_Planet_Earth https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wncvHvUujX8&t=557s https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1y0Gq2pf5oc https://www.famous-trials.com/rubyridge/1151-fbirevisedrules https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lon_Horiuchi

episodes.title: Branch Davidians
episodes.description: Most people have heard of the Waco massacre. But how did we get there? In this chapter of the cult chronicles, we’re learning about the branch Davidians. TW: Please listen at your own risk. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Victor_Houteff https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Seventh-day_Adventist_Church https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Benjamin_Roden https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Branch_Davidians https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_Koresh https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cyrus_the_Great https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4GJhsnxcsrY https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AIDBvD3kGKg Let’s Talk About Sects Podcast – Branch Davidians American Scandal – Season 15 https://swan-cymbals-ytgn.squarespace.com Waco American Apocalypse

episodes.title: What is a Cult?
episodes.description: We have all heard of cults, but what is a cult? What characteristics qualify an organization as a cult? This is chapter one of the cult chronicles. https://www.merriam-webster.com/dictionary/cult https://janjalalich.com/help/characteristics-associated-with-cults/ Uncultured by Daniella Mestyanek Young https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hm6heglECcI

episodes.title: Cults with Daniella Mestyanek Young
episodes.description: DANIELLA MESTYANEK YOUNG is a scholar of cults and extreme groups, and extremely bad leadership, and the author of the critically acclaimed memoir UNCULTURED. Daniella was raised in the religious sex cult, The Children of God. She later served as an intelligence officer for the US Army, making the rank of Captain, and became one of the first women in US Army history to conduct deliberate ground combat operations when she volunteered to serve on a Female Engagement Team, and received the Presidential Volunteer Service Award. TW: Please listen at your own discretion. Uncultured: https://www.amazon.com/Uncultured-Memoir-Daniella-Mestyanek-Young/dp/1250280117/ref=tmm_hrd_swatch_0?_encoding=UTF8&amp&qid=1667828324&amp&sr=8-1 UnAmerican: https://www.patreon.com/GroupBehaviorGal/shop/unamerican-video-book-memoir-217440?utm_medium=clipboard_copy&utm_source=copyLink&utm_campaign=productshare_creator&utm_content=join_link Twitter: @daniellamyoung TikTok: @daniellamestyanekyoung Instagram: @_daniellamyoung https://www.uncultureyourself.com/ Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuFRBZ2w3QsYs7Km69keHsg
